participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Playful and ambitious with a curious nature.
participant_1.background: I have found the cure for the common cold. I am plotting on taking over the world. I love to sing in the shower. My brother and I have bright red hair. My nickname is bubblegum.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and friendly, with a passion for storytelling.
participant_2.background: My uncle used to work on fish boats in Florida. I have never been to the west coast of the United States. I was once on the local news, and not for anything illegal. My father used to drive a taxi cab in the 1970s. I have been to Canada two times my entire life.

content.text: I'm bubblegum. It's great to meet you!
Hi bubblegum! It's nice to meet you too.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to go fishing, and I've been to Canada twice.
Oh, that's cool! I've never been to Canada before.
You should definitely go! It's beautiful.
I will one day!
My dad used to drive a taxi cab in the 70's, and my uncle used to work on fish boats in Florida.
That's so cool! I love hearing about people's family history.
Me too! It's interesting to learn about where you came from.
I agree! So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I love to go to the beach, and I've been on the local news once.
Oh, really? What for?
I was interviewed about my business.
Oh, that's cool! What kind of business do you have?
I own a small coffee shop.
Oh, that's awesome! I love coffee!
Me too! I'm glad you're a fan.
I am! I love trying new coffees.
Me too! I love trying new coffee beans from all over the world.
That's so cool! I've never been a coffee bean connoisseur, but I'm learning!
You're on your way
